name: Fairy Tail: Brave Guild
summary:
An web-based RPG where one partakes in a variety of events in order to gather different rarity cards containing unique art of characters from the Fairy Tail series.

By collecting and combining various cards, the player can gain experience and level up their personal deck to create a stronger effect that greatly affects the success of battles. It's also possible to collaborate with friends in monthly defense and subjugation raids to help raise the group's guild rank and become a top magic guild in the game.

Note: can also be accessed through the GREE (グリー) app on Android or iOS.
